description: Examines the target system to suggest potential local privilege escalation exploits.
sampleOutput:
# Running local_exploit_suggester
[*] Checking target...
[+] Found 0-day privilege escalation path

description: Enables Remote Desktop Protocol on the target Windows system.
sampleOutput:
# Running enable_rdp
[*] RDP is already enabled
[+] Operation completed successfully

description: Collects network interface and routing information from a Linux host.
sampleOutput:
# Running enum_network
[*] Gathering network info
[+] Interface eth0 192.168.0.5
